sections.heading: safety answering point, defined
sections.text: Public safety answering point means a local governmental entity responsible for receiving 911 calls and processing those calls according to a specific operational policy.SourceLaws 2016, LB938, § 22;R.S.1943, (2024), § 86-1022;Laws 2025, LB362, § 34.Effective Date: Se

86-1052.Public safety answering point, defined.

Public safety answering point means a local governmental entity responsible for receiving 911 calls and processing those calls according to a specific operational policy.

SourceLaws 2016, LB938, § 22;R.S.1943, (2024), § 86-1022;Laws 2025, LB362, § 34.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
